original_text: But Simeon and Levi replied, ‘Shechem should not have had sex with our sister as if she were a prostitute.’
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 그가 우리 누이를 창녀 같이 대우함이 옳으니이까

sentences.original_text: Shechem should not have had sex with our sister
sentences.korean_translation: 세겜은 우리 여동생과 성관계를 하지 않았어야 했다

sentences.original_text: as if she were a prostitute
